verses.verse: Set the shofar <S%H7782><s%> to thy mouth <S%H2441><s%>. He shall come as an eagle <S%H5404><s%> against the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, because they have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and trespassed <S%H6586><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against my Torah <S%H8451><s%>.
Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall cry <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, My 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, we know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee.
Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> hath cast off <S%H2186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the thing that is good <S%H2896><s%>: the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him.

They have set up kings <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, but not by me: they have made princes <S%H7786><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and I knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it not: of their silver <S%H3701><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> have they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them idols <S%H6091><s%>, that they may be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

Thy calf <S%H5695><s%>, O SHomron <S%H8111><s%>, hath cast <S%H2186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee off; mine anger <S%H639><s%> is kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against them: how long will it be ere <S%H3808><s%> they attain <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to innocency <S%H5356><s%> ?

For from Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> was it also: the workman <S%H2796><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it; therefore it is not 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: but the calf <S%H5695><s%> of SHomron <S%H8111><s%> shall be broken in pieces <S%H7616><s%>.

For they have sown <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%>, and they shall reap <S%H7114><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the whirlwind <S%H5492><s%>: it hath no stalk <S%H7054><s%>: the bud <S%H6780><s%> shall yield <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no meal <S%H7058><s%>: if <S%H194><s%> so be it yield <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, the strangers <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> shall swallow it up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> is swallowed up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: now shall they be among the goyim <S%H1471><s%> as a vessel <S%H3627><s%> wherein is no pleasure <S%H2656><s%>.

For they are gone up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Ashur <S%H804><s%>, a wild ass <S%H6501><s%> alone <S%H909><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by himself: Efrayim <S%H669><s%> hath hired <S%H8566><s%> <S%H8689><s%> lovers <S%H158><s%>.

Yea, though they have hired <S%H8566><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, now will I gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them, and they shall sorrow <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> for the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of princes <S%H8269><s%>.

Because Efrayim <S%H669><s%> hath made many <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8689><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> to sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, altars <S%H4196><s%> shall be unto him to sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

I have written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to him the great things <S%H7230><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7239><s%> of my Torah <S%H8451><s%>, but they were counted <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8738><s%> as a strange thing <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%>.

They sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> for the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of mine offerings <S%H1890><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it; but the YY <S%H3068><s%> accepteth <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them not; now will he remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their sins <S%H2403><s%>: they shall return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

For Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> hath forgotten <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his Maker <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and buildeth <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> temples <S%H1964><s%>; and Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> hath multiplied <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8689><s%> fenced <S%H1219><s%> <S%H8803><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>: but I will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> upon his cities <S%H5892><s%>, and it shall devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the palaces <S%H759><s%> thereof.
